short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and monitor website changes with this web extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Site Spy Monitor is a web application that allows users to track changes in websites over time

With Site Spy Monitor, users can:

- Add websites to a monitoring list
- Check all websites by button click on "Check All"

Getting Started:
- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store
- Click on the Site Spy Monitor icon in your browser's extension bar
- Add the URL of the website you want to track
- Set the desired interval to check for changes

If you want to check, if website has changed just click on "Check All" button

To stop monitoring a website, simply remove it from your list
